name: places/ChIJN31vDr1YwokRtKaGERdn6lA
formattedAddress: 1009 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1009 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028-0936, USA

originalText.text:
I  have had surgery “work done” by Dr. Matarasso as well as my family members. His work is stellar, incredible.  Of course we all needed/wanted different surgeries.  Since my husband is a surgeon he sees in the OR & knows who is a gifted surgeon and who is not.

I learned that he is the president of the American Society of Plastic Surgeons. It is a coveted position. To attain this you must be highly respected by your peers voted on & I am not surprised he is the recipient of President.

My friend called me in a panic : during a sports game, there was a collision. A nose was badly bent; I saw pictures, yikes it was awful. Now it's perfect.

Dr. Matarasso’s personality (I only write this for you since I don’t care about personalities I  care about surgical ability) is kind and caring before and after surgery.

I know I shouldn’t write this (sorry Dr. M.) but there’s a back door for movie stars and the likes I never used it, I had to find out about it myself. Oh well, maybe in my next life I can use the back door.

originalText.text:
I could not say enough good things about my Rhinoplasty experience with Dr Matarasso.

He gives his patients his full undivided attention. He is focused and detail oriented - a perfectionist is definitely something you want from a plastic surgeon.

The surgery is done in a hospital. (Not some OR in the back of someone’s office) it’s a Northwell ambulatory center. There is the check in, the lobby, the floor where you get prepped, and another floor where you’re taken to go to surgery. Then the recovery area. All the staff was very professional and helpful as well.

He wasn’t doing surgeries one after another. He came to the hospital, did my surgery, then left. It wasn’t as if there were 4 patients in a waiting room all waiting our turn to get on the operating table one after another. Again, the patients have his undivided attention.

He gave very clear and specific instructions all consolidated in a packet. His staff is there on call if there is any questions as well - they were a pleasure to work with.

My case was very complex, as it was a revision, and I have thick skin.  He made it look beautiful. I finally have my dream nose. Sleek, upturned, defined tip, yet natural. I’m glad I saw other doctors for consultations to know that the only doctor putting a scalpel to my face is Dr Matarasso.

He is super knowledgeable & accredited. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: I had a neck lift by Dr. Alan Matarasso in my early 50's and was extremely satisfied with the results.  He has a way of making one look much younger without looking tight.  I find the results of Dr. Matarasso's surgeries to be well thought out and very natural.  The use of a professional photographer referred by Dr. Matarasso pre and post surgery proves the high quality of his work.  Recently at age 73, I had a consultation with him to learn what his thoughts were regarding my mouth area which was loose and turning downwards.  He recommended a mid face lift, using the same scars behind my ears from my earlier neck lift which are placed such that I am able to wear my hair up as I often do.  I am again extremely happy with the results and look 20 years younger, with the same natural look Dr. Matarasso is known for.  I would not hesitate to recommend what I consider a genius surgeon to anyone.  Dr. Matarasso is a pleasure to talk to and takes the time to make one feel confident about his advice.  His staff, from Kim, his wonderful office administrator, to Stephanie, his office nurse who very competently takes care of all post-surgery procedures, are top notch and very responsive.

originalText.text: Terrible rhinoplasty years ago. He scraped so much cartilage out of the tip of my nose, that it created resultant drooping, like a banana. He also caused my nose to noticeably tilt to the left, which it did not do prior, and did not fix a  bump, which was the main reason for the procedure. Furthermore, he shockingly and horrifyingly made cruel and sadistic remarks to me during the surgery, while I was trapped on the operating table (back in the day, you were not fully knocked-out). Needless to say, my nose was much better looking, before he “worked” on me. In addition, my nasal breathing ability has been significantly reduced, ever since this nightmare operation.

originalText.text: Dr. Matarasso is a phenomenal Doctor! Extremely cautious and smart. An artist. I highly recommend him
